title: South Africa: State-Owned Enterprises - Chaos Inside a Mess, Wrapped in Politics
text:
South Africa: Malema's Party Kicks Off Zuma Question Session 
They block industry (Eskom), they need bail-outs (SAA, SAA and SAA), they waste money on tall Spanish locomotives (Prasa) badly affecting the country's transportation, and in turn affecting many other businesses down the line, and also contributing to environmental degradation. This is not to mention the country's road network, that is not so well managed by the South African National Roads Agency. Still, says the government, something is... South Africa
